summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 10.3°C) and outside temperature (down 10.1°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 10%).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 317 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles) and cloud levels (up 205 m) when compared to today.

The cloud levels measurements for yesterday ranged from 425m to 1526m and averaged 636.4m, while the past week and month indicated warmer conditions.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; prepare for cold, chilly weather ahead. Also, dry and less humid conditions and mostly calm with light air movement. Showers, cloud cover will be low, possibly causing overcast or foggy conditions, and it’s dim outside. Little change in the weather.
